Triss the Spellshaper DMN
UBR 2UBR 5 Legendary Creature - Cat Wizard Creature 2/3
2 Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell from your hand during each of your turns, mill three cards. Whenever one or more instant or sorcery cards are put into your graveyard from your library, manifest the top card of your library. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it’s a creature card.)
Ankle the Biter DMN
BR 1BR 3 Legendary Creature - Goblin Lil Guy Warrior Creature 3/1
2 Intimidate, first strike (This creature can’t be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Whenever a creature is put into your hand from the battlefield or the graveyard, create a tapped Treasure token. Ankle the Biter deals 1 damage to each opponent. Commander dash 2BR (Put Ankle the Biter onto the battlefield from the command zone. If you do, it gains haste, and it’s returned to the command zone at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)
Beeblebum DMN
RG 4RG 6 Legendary Enchantment Creature - Troll Creature 7/5
2 Whenever Beeblebum or another enchantment enters the battlefield, Beeblebum deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Death of the Mind DMN
UBR XXUBR 3 Sorcery Sorcery
3 Repeat the following process X times. Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, put that card into your graveyard. Shuffle your library.
Warender DMN
BR BBR 3 Creature - Lil Guy Warrior Creature 2/2
2 Haste You may pay {0} rather than pay the dash cost of the first card you dash each turn.
Beeblebum's Wrath DMN
RG 2RG 4 Enchantment Enchantment
1 Sacrifice an enchantment: Beeblebum’s Wrath deals damage to target creature, planeswalker, or player equal to the sacrificed enchantment’s mana value. Overload 6RG (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)
“You beeble’d too far, bum.”
